You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesC C] > &cap;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Cap;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/22d2/index.htm U+022D2].
  * `&cap;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2229/index.htm U+02229].
